verbs.description: [ARG0: south carolina] [V: hopes] [ARG1: early season woes fixed during bye week the first half of the season] has not gone the way south carolina had expected the gamecocks believe there still plenty of time left to turn things back in the winning direction we 're not where we want to be we know that we can improve defensive end bryson allen - williams said tuesday the mistakes we 've been making have been on us those mistakes have cost south carolina 3 - 3 2 - 3 southeastern conference against ranked opponents including georgia kentucky and last time out texas a&m a week off allen - williams said gave the gamecocks time to clear their heads and get focused on finishing the season strong gamecocks coastal carolina bentley jake bentley tennessee will muschamp south carolina bye
